page.title: 10Playground Games
page.content: My favourite game is called Ice Cream. There is one person who stands in front of a wall and faces it. The other people who are playing have to try and touch the wall without "it" seeing them. If you are seen you have to stand with your arms sticking out and your feet apart. When two people have been seen they have to join hands. When everybody has been seen the person at the wall has to tell a story. I shall give you an example. "I went to the shops yesterday and I bought an ICE CREAM!". On the words Ice Cream everyone has to run to the starting line before the person who is "it" touches you. If you are touched then you are the new "it". Rachael Hooper age 9
